Class HerdStudentBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.extension.HerdStudentBean

  • public class HerdStudentBean
extends java.lang.Object
    Auxiliary class that retrieves the herds owned by the students of a course

    patricio
